message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500.  It's in excellent condition and worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I am willing to pay $8,800 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm hoping to get a little closer to my asking price. How about $9,200?  I'm confident you'll find this product a great value at that price.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose $9,000 as a fair price.
